Html: This is great idea! Right now I'm trying to use both seperately but it only makes sense to pull them together.

Currently for me it's bit challenging managing even this small project and I can't imagine right now joining any bigger team. So until we have a clear idea what we want to achieve I don't see any value in merging these two libraries.

I don't understand where you might have problems by using these two libraries separetly in a single project. The only issue I imagine is that we don't ship any skin that would match the look-and-feel Ascend.net has, but we do ship you tools so it's up to you to create one you like.
